product_name: MaryJanesFarm Organic Mac 'n Cheese - Single Serving
long_description: A favorite of everyone! Macaroni and cheese can please even the finickiest of little hikers. Can be prepared in its own pouch; just add boiling water, stir and let stand before serving. Made with all-natural, organic ingredients. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
